import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; export const ItemCard = ({index, item, toggleEditing, onChangeUpdate, onCancel}) => (
{item.isEditing ?
onChangeUpdate(event, index)} required /> onChangeUpdate(event, index)} required />
:

{item.name}

Price ${item.price}

}
); ItemCard.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.shape({ name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, price: PropTypes.string.isRequired, img: PropTypes.string.isRequired }), toggleEditing: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onChangeUpdate: PropTypes.func.isRequired };
